name: updateRequest
description: Add new images or instructions to an existing request for iterative refinement. Use this to enhance or modify the processing requirements of a request that's already been created.

requestId.description: The unique ID of the request to update, returned from newRequest or previous tool calls.

newImages.description: Array of new file IDs to add. CRITICAL: Use fileStorage.fileId from recent messages with successful media storage (32-char hex), NOT message_id. Look for fileStorage.status='success' and extract fileStorage.fileId. Empty array if no new images.

items.description: Crypto-secure file ID from fileStorage.fileId field (example: '6a8b31e539d4518206ecc11834a250a3')

instructions.description: Additional instructions or modifications for the image processing. Examples: 'Make the background more blurred', 'Change lighting to be more dramatic', 'Add text overlay saying Welcome', 'Create 3 variations'. Use empty string if no new instructions.
